description: Customer acquisition, engagement, and brand building through campaigns and content

typical_processes.name: Campaign Execution & Optimization
typical_processes.description: Planning, launching, and optimizing marketing campaigns

typical_processes.name: Customer Segmentation & Targeting
typical_processes.description: Identifying and defining customer segments for targeting

typical_processes.name: Content Creation & Management
typical_processes.description: Creating and managing marketing content and assets

common_outputs.name: Campaign Performance Reports
common_outputs.description: Reports showing performance metrics for marketing campaigns
common_pain_points: Data is scattered across multiple platforms
Manual data aggregation takes days
Attribution is unclear or inconsistent
Can't track ROI accurately
Reports are outdated by the time they're shared
Inconsistent metrics across campaigns

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train team on analytics tools, hire marketing data analyst
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: Implement unified analytics platform, automated reporting, AI-powered attribution
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize metrics definitions, implement real-time dashboards

common_outputs.name: Customer Segments
common_outputs.description: Defined groups of customers with similar characteristics for targeting
common_pain_points: Segments are based on gut feel, not data
Segmentation is outdated (done once years ago)
Can't operationalize segments in campaigns
Segments overlap or are too broad
No way to track segment performance
Manual segmentation in spreadsheets

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train on segmentation techniques, hire data scientist
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI-powered clustering and segmentation, automated segment updates
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Implement regular segmentation refresh, define segment governance

common_outputs.name: Marketing Content
common_outputs.description: Blog posts, whitepapers, case studies, emails, and other marketing materials
common_pain_points: Content creation is too slow (weeks per piece)
Inconsistent quality across content
Hard to find existing content (duplication)
No data on what content performs
Content approval process is bottleneck
Can't personalize content at scale

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Hire content specialists, train on content tools
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI content generation, automated personalization, content recommendation
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize content templates, implement content governance

common_outputs.name: Marketing Attribution Reports
common_outputs.description: Analysis showing which marketing touchpoints drive conversions
common_pain_points: Using last-touch attribution (not accurate)
Can't track cross-channel journeys
Attribution model is too simple or too complex
Data integration is manual and error-prone
Can't prove marketing ROI to leadership
Attribution changes with every analysis

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train on attribution modeling, hire attribution specialist
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: Multi-touch attribution platform, AI-powered attribution, automated data integration
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize attribution methodology, implement regular reviews

common_outputs.name: Marketing Qualified Leads (MQLs)
common_outputs.description: Leads that meet criteria for sales engagement based on marketing signals
common_pain_points: MQL-to-SQL conversion rate is low (<20%)
Sales rejects most MQLs as unqualified
Lead scoring model is outdated or arbitrary
Can't identify high-intent leads quickly
Leads go cold before sales contacts them
Inconsistent lead qualification criteria

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Align marketing and sales on criteria, train on lead scoring
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI-powered lead scoring, predictive lead qualification, automated routing
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Implement SLA for lead handoff, regular scoring model updates

common_outputs.name: Customer Sentiment Analysis
common_outputs.description: Analysis of customer feedback and sentiment across channels

typical_creation_context.system: Social Listening Tool or Analytics Platform

common_pain_points: Manual review of feedback is overwhelming
Can't identify trends or themes quickly
Sentiment analysis is inaccurate or too simple
Feedback is scattered across channels
No way to track sentiment over time
Can't link sentiment to business outcomes

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train on sentiment analysis tools, hire insights analyst
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI-powered sentiment analysis, automated theme extraction, real-time monitoring
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Centralize feedback collection, implement regular sentiment reviews
